page.title: 09EAST LODGE LITTLE OFFLEY
page.content: We visited the family in East Lodge,to discover all we could about their employment and life style.Years ago the cottage would have been the lodge for Little Offley Manor House.We found there was a family of five living there,who are self employed in a family business.The business started in 1977,and the father now employs both his sons.It is a haulage business and the bulk of the work is carriage of agricultural food stuffs,within the local area,though occasionally trips are made to Derbyshire.The business is run from home and the wife helps with the book_keeping. At the rear of the house is a large workshop where the owner repairs commercial vehicles, for use in the haulage business.There is a large garden,part of which is cultivated to produce vegetables.
